name: Satsuriku no Tenshi: Episode.0
nutshell:
Satsuriku no Tenshi prequel
As a prison counselor, Daniel Dickens is no stranger to odd encounters with inmates. But when a particularly aggressive prisoner enters his office claiming that his session with a priest left him "fulfilled," Danny, who has led an unsatisfying life, has to know more. During their meeting, Danny finds there's little he can hide from this mysterious clergyman, and when an offer comes his way, he'll have to make a decision that will change his life forever…

name: Ojiichan Shinanai
nutshell: A pure angel descends from heaven to carry a dying old man to the afterlife. What she doesn't know is that he is not your typical feeble grandpa. No, he is much more… charming. Thus, their misadventures begin as the angel realizes what type of man she's dealing with. This old man won't die anytime soon.

name: The Compassionate Mother Star - Fist of the North Star: Julia Gaiden
nutshell:
This is the story of Yuria, a woman with the power to foresee the future, and destined to re-unite and rule over a war-plagued land.
Along with her companion Kenshiro, she struggles to comprehend the depth of her power, and to defy fate to save the ones she loves.

name: Re:Play
nutshell: Cree, the vocalist of a punk band named Faust, just lost her bass player and it puts her in a pinch. She meets Izsak who is perfect to be their new bass player, but he is shrouded in mystery. Cree soon develops a crush on Izsak, but soon his mysterious past will shake her world!

name: Shokushuhime
nutshell:
The kingdom of Sergei has a problem. The creatures of darkness known as Phantom Beasts have been appearing with increasing regularity, and attacking the populace.
Allemande, the Second Princess of the kingdom, has been tasked with keeping the peace. In addition to her impressive skill with the sword, she can also use her talking teddybear partner Maro to summon her own Phantom Beasts when things get too rough.
The Doujinshi & Manga Lexicon
Vol. 1
Vol. 2
Vol. 3

name: Kuu Intrudes From Above
nutshell: Kuu, a girl taller than a telephone pole. She leads a high school life with mild problems~♪

name: Blue Dragon - Ral Ω Grado
nutshell: In the days of war, a baby fused together with a "shadow" called Blue Dragon, a legend among the "shadows". Because of that, he was locked in darkness from birth until recently, 15 years later, to prevent his shadow from activating. From the beginning, the only person he knew was his tutor who would come see him everyday. But "shadows" have begun to run rampant as they escape from "Noir" through living beings. Humnas call for the release of Blue Dragon in order to help mankind; thus their journey begins to seal the "shadows" along with the strongest: their queen.

name: Hibike! Euphonium - Don Giovanni
nutshell: A Asuka x Kaori short story from pixiv.

name: Hidan no Aria
nutshell:
Tokyo Butei High School - a special school where armed detectives, also known as "Butei" are trained. Tohyama Kinji is a sophomore student who has a unique body which activates a "super mode" when stimulated by "something." He tries to hide it from others in order to live a peaceful life. But trouble finds him when he becomes a victim of a bombing incident, where he meets the Butei High "Assault" department elite, Aria H. Kanzaki.
Note: Chapter 94 and above (as well as the corresponding volumes) were retroactively relabeled with the subtitle "The Purple Lightning Witch" and their numbering was rebooted − so chapter 94 is "Shiden no Majo chapter 1" and volume 17 is "Shiden no Majo volume 1". Otherwise, the story continues normally.
See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.

name: Lie Huo Jiao Chou
tags: Reincarnation,Official Colored,Action,Demons,Long Strip,Romance,Boys' Love,Martial Arts,Adventure,Drama,Fantasy,Police,Web Comic,Mystery,Adaptation,Full Color
nutshell: Sheng Lingyuan lleva mucho tiempo muerto, desde que saltó al abismo rojo en ChiYuan, es decir, hasta que fue "despertado" por una fuerza desconocida tres mil años después.Xuan Ji es el recién nombrado líder del Equipo de Reacción Inmediata, que ayuda a controlar y limpiar el desorden cada vez que ocurren sucesos sobrenaturales.Los dos se unen por un evento extraño, y miles de años de conspiración y planificación cuidadosa comienzan a desarrollarse ante ellos.

name: Touhou - Koi*Hana (Doujinshi)
nutshell: An Alice x Reimu doujin.

name: House of Holes
nutshell: A young man who's enjoying the beginning of his adult life, living alone for the first time… finds out that there's more to his flat than was in the rental contract.

name: Superior Day
nutshell:
What would you do if you found out that your neighbour is a serial killer?
But more importantly: what would you do if some unknown third person was trying to make you kill him?!

name: Holy☆Hearts!
nutshell: Kyuno, who's aiming to become a Sister, just became a Sister-in-training, and started her dormitory life with Ginger and Alicia, aiming to be the same, however…

name: Midnight Sparkling
nutshell:
This one-shot was published in Karaku BL.
A prequel of Midnight sparkling.

name: Monster's Entertainment Guide
tags: Official Colored,Monsters,Animals,Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Boys' Love,Fantasy,Web Comic,Supernatural,Music,Full Color
nutshell: Due to the destruction of his home, mountain god Chen Shan entered the entertainment circle and accidentally became the film emperor. Meanwhile, the slow and adorable snail monster Lin Wo went down the mountain to seek shelter with Chen Shan. Although he was the film emperor's assistant in name, in reality he was the one being taken care of every day. These two helped similar monsters everywhere in the entertainment circle. They rebuilt the homes of displaced monsters, bringing about a pure camaraderie in which they could share their laughter and tears.

name: Mushishi
nutshell:
They exist in the most unexpected places – be it within your eyes and ears, under the floor and roof of your house, or the trees and flowers in your garden. They are everywhere and yet nowhere at the same time. Are they alive or not? Perhaps it is more apt to say they are beings who transcend the concept of life and death itself…
They are mushi.
Some wreak havoc in the lives of humans; while others bring them deliverance from suffering. Mushi are neither good, nor evil; for just like any other creature, they are merely striving to survive in this harsh, competitive world.
Ginko - a lone wanderer with a reclusive personality, offers help and guidance to those plagued by mushi. This is the tale of his travels and exploits in a wondrous world populated by these mysterious entities.


Won the Japanese Media Arts Festival Excellence Prize in 2003
Won the Kodansha Manga Award in 2006


Officially Published:

In Italian by Star Comics

name: Imperial Splendor
nutshell: After being betrayed twice, she transmigrated with her vengeance in hand. Her new body was weak and she had to rely on the imperial physician to stay alive. In front of others, he looked like the heir apparent that did not have long to live but possessed a genius intellect and photographic memory; in the dark, he was as cunning and strategic as they came. He was biding his time and accumulated influence and strength in the shadows. A trashy male lead and a trashy female lead both transmigrated together. She needs someone to rely on in this world, and he is her “chance.” In fact, the fates have long foretold their love for each other, like a curse that stretches across millennia, these two will always find each other in every lifetime.

name: K - Lost Small World
nutshell: This is the story of how Yata Misaki and Fushimi Saruhiko met, became fast friends, and, eventually, parted ways.

name: The Hero and the Elf
nutshell: The hero wanders into a forest protected by an elf

name: Tenshi no Fukuin
nutshell: In olden Britain, Orland, who is searching for the key to becoming King, meets a beautiful priest by the name of Ethelred, who is on the verge of being killed as a sacrifice. Now begins the dangerous adventure of these two, who have met in a chaotic world surrounded by swords and spiritual beliefs…

name: Yamada-san wa gyaru ni nari kirenai
nutshell: Yamada-san wants to be a gyaru, but she doesn't know how to become one.

name: Serious Villainess!
nutshell: I was reincarnated as Blanca, a villainess in the world of an Otome game that I loved in my previous life. It's unfortunate that I was reincarnated as Blanca, a character I don't like very much, but maybe I can witness a flirtatious scene between the heroine and her capture target without being charged for money! In order to make the love of the captured target and heroine more exciting than the game, I will do my best to be mean to the heroine, but for some reason the love doesn't seem to be progressing....The villainous daughter's all-out love comedy finally begins!

name: Ane Con
nutshell:
Hiiragi has been fond of Yoshino since she was adolescent, but she gets married to Hiiragi's older brother ....  One year after his brother died, Hiiragi returns to his parents' home, "Onsen Ryokan Miuraya."  Reunited with his widow, Yoshino, but his mother proposes to marry her as a successor to Miuraya !! I see her transforming into a nine-tailed fox!
[Translated with Google Translate]

name: ACCA - 13-ku Kansatsuka P.S.
nutshell: Prequel to ACCA - 13-ku Kansatsuka that focuses on the five ACCA heads during their early days.

name: A Week of Lust
nutshell:
A collection of seven omegaverse short stories.
What if your childhood friend who's living in the apartment next to yours is an omega? Love triangle, unrequited love, romantic comedy, battle, seduction. We're not sure about what you want, so we prepared a variety of hardcore BL titles for you!
The collection consists of:
Vol 1 - Lee Aru — Beta Test
Vol 2 - Hato — Love is Love
Vol 3 - MEL — Melting Point
Vol 4 - Ttomi — Without Saying Anything
Vol 5 - Ho Ben — Restless
Vol 6 - Pyo Ryu — Cat-and-Dog
Vol 7 - Fujo King — Heart Pounding Clinical Trial

name: Kyoujou
nutshell: Kimichika Kazama is an instructor at a police academy. He is keenly observant and watches over his students. He is calm as an instructor and has charisma, but strict. Students with various backgrounds attend the police academy with their own reasons of becoming police officers. They feel pressure having to follow the strict rules and have anxiety about getting kicked out of the academy. How many students will graduate among the 90 students? What is the real purpose of Kimichika Kazama giving hardship to the students?
